description.value: Your ancestors lived underground. Your ears are larger than those of other hobgoblins and sensitive to echoes. When you are underground, you can use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Seek]{Seek} action to sense @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Undetected]{Undetected} creatures within a @Template[type:burst|distance:30] instead of a @Template[type:burst|distance:15]. In addition, if you roll a success on an Acrobatics check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Squeeze]{Squeeze}, you get a critical success instead.

rules.text: {item|name} When you roll a success to Squeeze, you get a critical success instead.
